alert.note: Alert for Chatham; Montgomery; Moore; Randolph (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 12 at 4:51PM EDT until September 12 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Moore County in central North Carolina... Northeastern Montgomery County in central North Carolina... Southeastern Randolph County in central North Carolina... Southwestern Chatham County in central North Carolina... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 449 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Troy, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Troy, Biscoe, Seagrove, Robbins, Star, Steeds, Harpers Crossroads, Highfalls, Coleridge and Glendon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly.
